product_name: Anon ASFX1 Audio Earphones for Anon Helmets
long_description: Anon ASFX1 Audio earphones deliver the ultimate audio experience while playing in the snow. They integrate easily with any Anon adult snow helmet so you can enjoy your tunes while you ride. 40mm Skullcandy(TM) SquareNote drivers produce premium sound.
short_description: Anon ASFX1 Audio earphones deliver the ultimate audio experience while playing in the snow. They integrate easily with any Anon adult snow helmet so you can enjoy your tunes while you ride.
